stats Struct Reference

#include <stats.h>

Detailed Description

Various statistics about a given notesfile.

Field Documentation

unsigned stats::notes_read

Number of times any note in this notesfile has been read.

unsigned stats::resps_read

Number of times any response in this notesfile has been read.

unsigned stats::notes_written

Number of times a note has been written in this notesfile.

unsigned stats::resps_written

Number of times a response has been written in this notesfile.

unsigned stats::notes_received

Number of times a note has been received via the network and inserted into this notesfile. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::resps_received

Number of times a response has been received via the network and inserted into this notesfile. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::notes_sent

Number of times a note from this notesfile has been transmitted via the network. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::resps_sent

Number of times a response from this notesfile has been transmitted via the network. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::notes_dropped

Number of duplicate notes received and discarded. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::resps_dropped

Number of duplicate responses received and discarded. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::network_sends

Number of times an outgoing network connection has been established for this notesfile. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::network_receipts

Number of times an incoming network connection has been established for this notesfile. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::orphans_received

Number of 'orphaned responses', or responses for which the basenote could not be determined, received via the network for this notesfile. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::orphans_adopted

Number of 'orphaned responses', or responses for which the basenote could not be determined, received via the network and adopted into a basenote in this notesfiles. Currently unused.

unsigned stats::entries

Number of times a user has entered this notesfile.

unsigned stats::total_time

Total time in seconds spent in this notesfile by users.

time_t stats::created

The date this notesfile was created.

time_t stats::last_used

The last time this notesfile was entered by a user.

unsigned stats::days_used

The number of distinct calendars days on which at least one user entered this notesfile.
